    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs=""
>
[Statue Skin Salve](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2520)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Enmity Cycle</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Enmity Cycle](/Sources.aspx?ID=200) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Three Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gritty salve can be applied to the skin of a creature to form a thin layer of smooth stone on its body for 20 minutes. During this time, it gains resistance 3 to piercing and slashing damage. Further, the creature gains a +2 item bonus to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) a statue or creature made of stone for 8 hours, or until its body is fully submersed in water.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
